summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, declaring property known as Webster Substation located in Seattle, Washington, surplus to the City's needs and not required for providing continued public utility services, authorizing the sale to King County, a political subdivision of the State of Washington, establishing the fair market value therefor, and authorizing the Superintendent of the City Light Department to execute the sale documents. (P.M. \#240428-4-301)
